## Feature Type

- [ ] New component
- [ ] Enhancement to existing component
- [ ] New utility/hook
- [ ] Documentation improvement
- [ ] Other

## Problem or Use Case

A clear description of the problem this feature would solve or the use case it addresses.

Example: "I need a DatePicker component for form inputs, but the library doesn't provide one."

## Proposed Solution

A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

### API Design (if applicable)

If requesting a new component, describe the proposed API:

```tsx
// Example usage
<ComponentName
  prop1="value"
  prop2={true}
  onAction={() => {}}
/>
```

### Key Features

- Feature 1
- Feature 2
- Feature 3

## Alternatives Considered

Describe any alternative solutions or workarounds you've considered:

- Using library X instead
- Building a custom component
- Other approaches

## Design References

If you have visual references or examples from other libraries, please share them here:

- Link to similar component in other libraries
- Screenshots or mockups
- Design inspiration

## Additional Context

Add any other context, screenshots, or examples about the feature request here.

## Implementation Willingness

- [ ] I'm willing to submit a PR to implement this feature
- [ ] I can help with testing/feedback
- [ ] I need the maintainers to implement this
